DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effectiveness of RXI-109 in reducing the recurrence of keloid formation following elective keloid excision.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Effectiveness and Safety of RXI-109 on the Outcome of Keloid Excision Surgery in Healthy Adults
DOC.criteria: Adults, 2155 years of age. Two keloids of approximately similar size and anatomical location on the earlobe, neck, or torso. Keloids to be excised must have been present for > 1 year. Use of tobacco or nicotinecontaining products Pregnant or lactating Postmenopausal or full hysterectomy
